name: Prison Break RPG
description:
"Prison Break RPG" is an RPG game with all the basic elements of RPG. If you want to have a good time playing a rpg game, "Prison Break RPG" is the perfect game for you.

In this game you will embody a character that will be locked in a prison, and this character will have to escape from it. To do so, he will have to overcome tests and face many difficulties.
This game has two aspects in terms of gameplay:
You will find an escape story that revolves around the main character, with the characteristic touches of rpg games. Apart from that, you will have to face numerous puzzles and riddles that will be difficult for anyone. In addition to that, the game takes into account the stealth and not being seen by the guards. And do not worry, because if the guards see you, you can fix that situation with a game of skill.

What to expect:

-Escape story

-Puzzles and riddles.

-Stealth is important

How to play:

-Use Arrow keys to move and space to interact.
